text:
Mónica Luiza Miguel (13 March 1936 – 12 August 2020) was a Mexican actress, telenovela director and singer. She was born in Tepic, Nayarit. She was known for her acting roles in "I Dream in Another Language", "Más allá del puente" and "Under Fire". She directed episodes of "Teresa".
Miguel died on 12 August 2020 in Mexico City from cancer-related problems, aged 84.
